The blood of dragons flows through your veins. These beasts are both fearsome in combat and skilled at magic

Spell Listarcane
Bloodline SkillsArcana, Intimidation
Granted Spellscantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]{Resist Energy}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Chromatic Wall]{Chromatic Wall}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Form]{Dragon Form}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mask of Terror]{Mask of Terror}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Prismatic Wall]{Prismatic Wall}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Overwhelming Presence]{Overwhelming Presence}
Bloodline Spellsinitial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Claws]{Dragon Claws}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Breath]{Dragon Breath}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dragon Wings]{Dragon Wings}
Blood MagicDraconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Dragon Type

At 1st level, choose the type of dragon that influenced your bloodline. You can't change your dragon type later. This affects how some of your bloodline spells function. The good metallic dragons and their damage types are brass (fire), bronze (electricity), copper (acid), gold (fire), and silver (cold). The evil chromatic dragons and their damage types are black (acid), blue (electricity), green (poison), red (fire), and white (cold).
